So rule: choose the wild animal. That fits all: jaguar wild, donkey domesticated -> output jaguar. sperm whale wild, labradoodle domesticated -> sperm whale. guinea pig domesticated, wildebeest wild -> wildebeest. dog domesticated, elephant wild -> elephant. whale shark wild, cockapoo domesticated -> whale shark.
